about_the_game:
SVG-001 PUZZLE was the very first Short Video Game in my SVG series.

It's a very classic jigsaw puzzle game with stunning visuals and beautifully crafted environments and characters.

I started this project for my little girl which love doing puzzle.





With "Puzzle" as keyword, everything is about puzzle, the main character is a puzzle piece which dive into a mesmerizing journey where every piece matters, and every solution unlocks a new mystery. (WIP)

More levels will be added later. (WIP)
detailed_description:
Roadmap

The link to access the public roadmap is on our Discord.


Discord


Feature List

v0.1 :

  • 1 simple level.
  • Hidden pieces to unlock by assembling others.
  • Trap that repels your puzzle pieces.
  • 8 extra artworks.


About the Game

SVG-001 PUZZLE was the very first Short Video Game in my SVG series.

It's a very classic jigsaw puzzle game with stunning visuals and beautifully crafted environments and characters.

I started this project for my little girl which love doing puzzle.





With "Puzzle" as keyword, everything is about puzzle, the main character is a puzzle piece which dive into a mesmerizing journey where every piece matters, and every solution unlocks a new mystery. (WIP)

More levels will be added later. (WIP)
name: SVG-001 PUZZLE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game requires a resolution higher than 1024x1024.

short_description: Classic jigsaw puzzle with beautiful visuals, waiting for you to piece it together.
